summary: have you seen that screenshot of dan with his arm around phil? opinions?
question: have you seen that screenshot of dan with his arm around phil? opinions?
answer:
Yes. Looking forward to another demon theory cringe fest.

People have their arms around other people all the time. People can have best friends. People can also have partners. People can have both, or neither. And then, what? Seriously, then what? Who the fuck cares? Why TF is this a big deal?

I wish people cared less.

reblog.comment:

I wish people cared less.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I have so much respect for them putting up with all this bs. Honestly if I was in their situation I'd have quit by now because I...
question: I have so much respect for them putting up with all this bs. Honestly if I was in their situation I'd have quit by now because I wouldn't be able to handle the phandom. How the fuck do people call themselves a fan if they don't fucking respect who they're a fan of?? And a lot of people's ideas of what respect is is seriously twisted. It's just so sad. And you call people out on it and they're like "but it's so obvious", well to me common fucking human decency and respect to others is obvious.
answer: I totally agree. Like, it’s 2018. Are we really still doing this? Just let them live for Christ sake, we’re not entitled to shit. Who cares if it’s obvious? Nod your head and move on.

reblog.comment: I totally agree. Like, it’s 2018. Are we really still doing this? Just let them live for Christ sake, we’re not entitled to shit. Who cares if it’s obvious? Nod your head and move on.

trail.content_raw: I totally agree. Like, it’s 2018. Are we really still doing this? Just let them live for Christ sake, we’re not entitled to shit. Who cares if it’s obvious? Nod your head and move on.
trail.content: I totally agree. Like, it’s 2018. Are we really still doing this? Just let them live for Christ sake, we’re not entitled to shit. Who cares if it’s obvious? Nod your head and move on.

summary: Hot take: I saw someone say that Dan was gesturing or waving in the video and that Phil was behind him so the angle makes it...
question: Hot take: I saw someone say that Dan was gesturing or waving in the video and that Phil was behind him so the angle makes it look like he was putting his arm around Phil and after I saw the video I'm kinda wanting to agree
answer: I mean, it’s possible. Like I said, it’s hard to tell unless you really analyze it, and analyzing it is just weird so idk why people are doing it.

tags: i did bad stuff as well
but cant we get over it now
summary:
I hate everything about the screenshot that’s going around atm.
what do you think will they do if they see how you react to...
body:
I hate everything about the screenshot that’s going around atm.

what do you think will they do if they see how you react to something that normal - be more open about their lives and feel free to share more or get more private?

they didnt know that they were filmed and if they knew they would’ve run out of the camera view because their fans, who analyze every move, could screenshot something for “proof“

i feel bad for them and i feel bad for being part of a community of people, who want to support dnp and want them to be more open, but do such things at the same time

tags: PLEASE ADD ON IN THE REBLOGS
i am so bad at tags
summary: A NOTE ABOUT ANON HATE
body:
A NOTE ABOUT ANON HATE

“There’s been a major increase of hate in the phandom. Not just to me but a lot of other lovely blogs. Do NOT say something you wouldn’t say off anon. You know better than this. You have no idea what’s going on for people. For some Tumblr is their only escape from a bad life and by making awful anons, they feel absolutely useless”

                                        -Ade, previously @/adeponol

Anon hate has been on the rise lately here on tumblr. No matter the reason, sending harmful anons is something you should never ever do. Ever. For the person sending it, it might just be a quick tap on the keyboard, but it can have really negative consequences on the receiver. It could make them have a bad day, fall into depression, start having suicidal thoughts… Nothing good will ever come out of sending anon hate. 

Everyone makes mistakes, and through these we learn and grow as humans. A mistake is no reason to be mean to someone. Instead, help them. Be kind and supportive. Also, there is nothing wrong with constructive criticism. There’s a big difference between constructive criticism and just straight up hate. Criticism should be sent with the intent to help the person, not to attack them. If all you have to say is harmful and mean, don’t say it. 

“SENDING HATE IS JUST DOWNRIGHT EVIL”

                                         -Faye, @dead-because-phan​

tl;dr – ANYONE CAN MAKE A MISTAKE BUT ITS NEVER AN EXCUSE TO BE MEAN AND SEND HATE. WE SHOULD ALL BE KIND TO EACH OTHER AND MAKE THIS DISASTER OF A WEBSITE A MOPRE POSITIVE PLACE. 

ANON HATE IS NEVER GOOD IN ANY SITUATION. BEFORE SENDING THAT THAT ASK, MAKE SURE YOU THINK WHAT CONSEQUENCES THAT ASK MIGHT HAVE. IS WHAT YOU’RE SENDING IS GENUINELY HELPFUL OR KIND? IF ITS MEAN AND DEMEANING, IT ISNT WORTH SENDING. 

Anon hate is yucky and doesn’t belong on this website, 

“SO PLEASE TREAT PEOPLE WITH KINDNESS. YOU NEVER KNOW IF IT’S THE ONLY BIT OF KINDNESS THEY’VE GOTTEN THAT DAY”

reblog.comment:

ANON HATE IS NEVER GOOD IN ANY SITUATION. BEFORE SENDING THAT THAT ASK, MAKE SURE YOU THINK WHAT CONSEQUENCES THAT ASK MIGHT HAVE. IS WHAT YOU’RE SENDING IS GENUINELY HELPFUL OR KIND? IF ITS MEAN AND DEMEANING, IT ISNT WORTH SENDING. 

Anon hate is yucky and doesn’t belong on this website, 

“SO PLEASE TREAT PEOPLE WITH KINDNESS. YOU NEVER KNOW IF IT’S THE ONLY BIT OF KINDNESS THEY’VE GOTTEN THAT DAY”
trail.content:
A NOTE ABOUT ANON HATE

“There’s been a major increase of hate in the phandom. Not just to me but a lot of other lovely blogs. Do NOT say something you wouldn’t say off anon. You know better than this. You have no idea what’s going on for people. For some Tumblr is their only escape from a bad life and by making awful anons, they feel absolutely useless”

                                        -Ade, previously @/adeponol

Anon hate has been on the rise lately here on tumblr. No matter the reason, sending harmful anons is something you should never ever do. Ever. For the person sending it, it might just be a quick tap on the keyboard, but it can have really negative consequences on the receiver. It could make them have a bad day, fall into depression, start having suicidal thoughts… Nothing good will ever come out of sending anon hate. 

Everyone makes mistakes, and through these we learn and grow as humans. A mistake is no reason to be mean to someone. Instead, help them. Be kind and supportive. Also, there is nothing wrong with constructive criticism. There’s a big difference between constructive criticism and just straight up hate. Criticism should be sent with the intent to help the person, not to attack them. If all you have to say is harmful and mean, don’t say it. 

“SENDING HATE IS JUST DOWNRIGHT EVIL”

                                         -Faye, @dead-because-phan​

tl;dr – ANYONE CAN MAKE A MISTAKE BUT ITS NEVER AN EXCUSE TO BE MEAN AND SEND HATE. WE SHOULD ALL BE KIND TO EACH OTHER AND MAKE THIS DISASTER OF A WEBSITE A MOPRE POSITIVE PLACE. 

ANON HATE IS NEVER GOOD IN ANY SITUATION. BEFORE SENDING THAT THAT ASK, MAKE SURE YOU THINK WHAT CONSEQUENCES THAT ASK MIGHT HAVE. IS WHAT YOU’RE SENDING IS GENUINELY HELPFUL OR KIND? IF ITS MEAN AND DEMEANING, IT ISNT WORTH SENDING. 

Anon hate is yucky and doesn’t belong on this website, 

“SO PLEASE TREAT PEOPLE WITH KINDNESS. YOU NEVER KNOW IF IT’S THE ONLY BIT OF KINDNESS THEY’VE GOTTEN THAT DAY”
